sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { toast } from 'react-hot-toast'; const Orders = () => { const [orders, setOrders] = useState([ { id: 'ORD-001', customer: 'John Doe', email: 'john@example.com', products: [ { name: 'Wireless Headphones', quantity: 1, price: 89.99 } ], total: 89.99, status: 'pending', date: '2024-01-15', paymentMethod: 'Credit Card' }, { id: 'ORD-002', customer: 'Jane Smith', email: 'jane@example.com', products: [ { name: 'Smartphone Case', quantity: 2, price: 19.99 }, { name: 'Screen Protector', quantity: 1, price: 12.99 } ], total: 52.97, status: 'processing', date: '2024-01-14', paymentMethod: 'PayPal' }, { id: 'ORD-003', customer: 'Mike Johnson', email: 'mike@example.com', products: [ { name: 'Laptop Stand', quantity: 1, price: 45.00 } ], total: 45.00, status: 'shipped', date: '2024-01-13', paymentMethod: 'Credit Card' }, { id: 'ORD-004', customer: 'Sarah Wilson', email: 'sarah@example.com', products: [ { name: 'Bluetooth Speaker', quantity: 1, price: 129.99 } ], total: 129.99, status: 'delivered', date: '2024-01-12', paymentMethod: 'Credit Card' }, { id: 'ORD-005', customer: 'David Brown', email: 'david@example.com', products: [ { name: 'Gaming Mouse', quantity: 1, price: 79.99 } ], total: 79.99, status: 'cancelled', date: '2024-01-11', paymentMethod: 'Credit Card' } ]); const [selectedStatus, setSelectedStatus] = useState('all'); const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState(''); const getStatusBadge = (status) => { const statusConfig = { pending: { color: 'bg-yellow-100 text-yellow-800', text: 'Pending' }, processing: { color: 'bg-blue-100 text-blue-800', text: 'Processing' }, shipped: { color: 'bg-purple-100 text-purple-800', text: 'Shipped' }, delivered: { color: 'bg-green-100 text-green-800', text: 'Delivered' }, cancelled: { color: 'bg-red-100 text-red-800', text: 'Cancelled' } }; const config = statusConfig[status] || statusConfig.pending; return ( {config.text} ); }; const updateOrderStatus = (orderId, newStatus) => { setOrders(prev => prev.map(order => order.id === orderId ? { ...order, status: newStatus } : order ) ); toast.success(`Order ${orderId} status updated to ${newStatus}`); }; const filteredOrders = orders.filter(order => { const matchesStatus = selectedStatus === 'all' || order.status === selectedStatus; const matchesSearch = order.id.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) || order.customer.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) || order.email.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()); return matchesStatus && matchesSearch; }); const getTotalRevenue = () => { return orders .filter(order => order.status !== 'cancelled') .reduce((sum, order) => sum + order.total, 0) .toFixed(2); }; const getOrderCount = (status) => { return orders.filter(order => order.status === status).length; }; return (

Orders

Manage and track customer orders

{/* Stats Cards */}

Total Orders

{orders.length}

Total Revenue

${getTotalRevenue()}

Pending

{getOrderCount('pending')}

Shipped

{getOrderCount('shipped')}

{/* Filters and Search */}
setSearchTerm(e.target.value)} className="w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 focus:border-transparent" />
{/* Orders Table */}
{filteredOrders.map((order) => ( ))}
Order Customer Products Total Status Date Actions
{order.id}
{order.paymentMethod}
{order.customer}
{order.email}
{order.products.map((product, index) => (
{product.quantity}x {product.name}
))}
${order.total.toFixed(2)}
 {getStatusBadge(order.status)}
{order.date}
{filteredOrders.length === 0 && (
No orders found

{searchTerm || selectedStatus !== 'all' ? 'Try adjusting your search or filter criteria' : 'Orders will appear here once customers start placing them' }

)}
); }; export default Orders;
